tool_description: Analyzes clinical trial protocols for compliance with regulatory standards and guidelines, identifying potential issues and recommendations.

protocol_document_path.description: Path to the clinical trial protocol document

error_messages: Protocol document not found: Verify the document path is correct and accessible
Invalid jurisdiction: Specify a recognized regulatory authority
Invalid trial phase: Use Phase I, Phase II, Phase III, or Phase IV
Unsupported therapeutic area: The specified indication is not recognized
Invalid analysis depth: Use standard, detailed, or comprehensive
Document format error: Protocol document format is not supported or corrupted
usage: Provide protocol document path, jurisdiction, trial phase, and therapeutic area to analyze protocol compliance with regulatory standards and receive recommendations.

identified_issues.description: List of compliance issues found in the protocol

regulatory_gaps.description: Areas where protocol may not meet regulatory expectations
